contest-event.event-date:
Jan. 1, 1921 Y Troedyrhiw Contest
Troedyrhiw Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
troedyrhiw-contest
None
Girls' School, Troedyrhiw, Glamorgan Selection and march elements. March between Belle Vue and Victoria buildings. Adjudicator was "Mr. Jones, Treherbert".
Ref: Merthyr Historian, vol 18, available at Merthyr Tydfil Central Library.
Dec. 23, 2015, 1:41 p.m. Dec. 23, 2015, 1:52 p.m.
